channel.title: Comments on: Suit And Sandals Guy On Metro

item.title: By: Bailey
item.dc:creator: Bailey
item.description:
I used to do this all the time at U.S. News. Hell, I did it yesterday. Plus their are my own modifications since I work with the fed now:
http://twitter.com/theorem_/status/3126079733 Apparently it's frowned upon to walk into a bank board meeting with no coat, no tie, open collar with a v-neck, and your sleeves rolled up.
item.content:encoded:
I used to do this all the time at U.S. News. Hell, I did it yesterday. Plus their are my own modifications since I work with the fed now:

http://twitter.com/theorem_/status/3126079733
Apparently it’s frowned upon to walk into a bank board meeting with no coat, no tie, open collar with a v-neck, and your sleeves rolled up.
